name: Gary Jone
description: i like to going beach and watch sport…i like everything except cheating and lier…I am outgoing and fun loving. I am caring, thoughtful, and a good listener. I have never cheated on a partner. I have been cheated on, so I know how it feels! Most of the time I am laid back and easy going, but can sometimes get all worked up over nothing! I have the ability to laugh at myself though, and accept constructive criticism.I am easy going and fun-loving. I have an outgoing personality. I am a conservative Christian, but not religious.Spiritual instead. I am looking for a best friend to fall in love with. Not interested in dating around;playing the field…… I am passionate,loving,caring,truthful and trustworthy…I am an attentive, loving, communicative, gentle, patient, affectionate, playful and passionate person….Am a man with good manners and God fearing woman always caring for someone who is ready to be with me for the rest of my life (O.K. so I’m addicted to chocolate). I hike, camp,…I love music, and I love being around people. If I am down or depressed, I can listen to my favorite music, or get out of self by doing something for someone else…
